class Loop:
    
    def __init__(self,cbs=None,persistent=False,**kwargs):
        store_attr(but='cbs')
        self.cbs=L()
        self.add_cbs(L(defaults.loop_callbacks)+L(cbs))
        self("after_create")
{% endraw %}
